items.sentence: I was surprised when I heard someone calling my name.
Tell Tom why you didn't buy what he asked you to buy.
Tom wasn't the first person to encourage me to do so.
Did you really believe that that was what Tom wanted?
Tom was looked after in the hospital by three nurses.
Now that I know what to expect, I won't be surprised.
Do you think that both Tom and Mary have lost weight?
Do you think that Tom and Mary have both lost weight?
My life would have been completely empty without you.
Do you have a pair of sunglasses that I could borrow?
